title: New Year's Dream
description: When Elizabeth finds herself at her best friend, Linds, New Year's Eve party, she can't help but feel like she's being set up. Her friend has always been after her to find a good man who treats her well. However, every guy she chooses seems to turn into a straight up asshat when she gets serious with them. She is fully ready to give up on men, and she's not into women in the least.
author: Linda Marie Pankow
